title: 12(13) of that Act, a draft has been laid before each House of the Oireachtas and
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Horse and Greyhound Racing
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Horse and Greyhound Racing 

Fund Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited horse greyhound racing fund regulation 2024

title: 12(13) of that Act, a draft has been laid before each House of the Oireachtas and
heading: 2. The amount of €1,835,094,213 is specified for the purposes of section
text_raw:
2. The amount of €1,835,094,213 is specified for the purposes of section 

12(5) of the Horse and Greyhound Racing Act 2001. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Finance consents to the foregoing Regulations. 

[591] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 October, 2024. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

Minister for Finance. 

The Minister for Public Expenditure, NDP Delivery and Reform consents to 
the foregoing Regulations. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 October, 2024. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 October, 2024. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [591]
